This item is now Free. 1.04-11
- Fixed a bug where a duplicate favorites section would appear. If this is showing for you you will have to manually edit the preference plist located at "/var/mobile/Library /Preferences/org.thebigboss.searchlight.plist" or just delete it

1.04-1
- Better caching for images
- Huge optimizations thanks to @rpetrich
- Optimizations for favorites (resets favorites)
- Swipe to delete favorites in settings

1.03-134
- Lockscreen timer reset when typing
- Experimental: Option to show badge count.
- Hides keyboard when pressing section indexes
- Fixed the section header bug. Have to search first though
- Added clear results on open option thanks to @MattCMultimedia
- Cached icons
- Bug fixes and some more small stuff

1.03-1
- Attempted to fix Smart Search conflict (@protosphere fixing it on their end as well)
- Better rotation? Only called when completely shown.
- Load settings when Spotlight is loaded instead of when SpringBoard is loaded - General bug fixes and code rewrites
- Option to disable section header blurring for less lag
- Added more values for recent apps in settings as requested by /u/mattperr
- Added caching of application names for faster loading (thanks @daementor)
- Better explained some settings

1.02-33
- Better Auxo/switcher support
- Added conflict with ClearOnOpen
- Bug Fixes

1.02-11
- Updated icon by Brian Overly (http://brianoverly.com)
- Added better compatibility with Smart Search
- Attempted to fix crash reported by Mike
- Option to disable on the Lockscreen

v1.02-1
- Added new icon by Brian Overly (http://brianoverly.com).
- Separated the behavior and appearance settings.
- Attempted to fix the NSInternalInconsistencyException bug.
- Fixed a bug where the header blur wasnâ€™t showing right.
- Added some tries and catches
- Added link to Spotlight extensions
- Fixed issue with App Store links. (Thanks @machinegun)

1.01
- Removed Activator dependency
- Keyboard now shows up on launch
- Added option to disable keyboard on launch
- Fixed issue where the icons were overlapping if the system font was not set to default (rudimentary fix, still working on it!)
- Added option to replace notification center
- Added ability to pay via Alipay (China)
1.0-22
- fixed lag issue (Thanks @daementor!)
- added option to enable/disable resizing of the header
- added option to enable/disable forcing rotation (Thanks for the idea Luc Paul!)
- made rotation slightly better

+ Fixed index out of bounds error. Thank you for the reports!
